q: Get comfortable being uncomfortable—that’s where growth lives.
Success is not measured by money or power, but by the difference you make in people’s lives.
Let your fear fuel your focus.
Your delay isn’t your denial.
You have to accept who you are before you can change.
A man grows up when he's able to overcome hardships. But still, it's important to protect what's important.
A warm smile is the universal language of kindness.
The roots of true achievement lie in the will to become the best that you can become.
You’re not falling behind—you’re refining your path.
Don't chase success. Become the person who attracts it.
The only way to truly escape the mundane is for you to constantly be evolving.
The dream works when you do.
Don’t quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.
Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart.
Clarity comes from engagement, not thought.
You grow more by trying than by planning.
The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
True strength is measured by how you handle adversity.
People who can’t throw something important away can never hope to change anything.
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
The lotus flower blooms most beautifully from the deepest and thickest mud.
Your life changes the moment you decide it must.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
When the path you walk always leads back to yourself, you never get lost.
Sometimes, things are not what they appear to be.
Be loyal to your purpose, not your comfort.
Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
The sea refuses no river.
Be patient with the space between planting and blooming.
You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
Sometimes the bad things that happen in our lives put us directly on the path to the best things.
The courage to continue is what separates those who succeed from those who almost did.
Silence isn’t empty, it’s full of answers.
The strongest people often have the softest hearts.
The best view comes after the hardest climb.
Every scar is a story of survival and strength.
The struggle you’re avoiding may be the shortcut you need.
The work you're avoiding holds the life you want.
Your dreams are valid, even if no one claps yet.
Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
Progress means trying again after failing again.
Little by little, a little becomes a lot.
If you don’t risk anything, you risk even more.
If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
You were born to impact—not to impress.
Take the risk or lose the chance.
The greatest wins are often unseen.
We are all capable of more than we think.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
You have to take risks. We only understand the miracle of life when we face uncertainty.
True power is protecting what you love.
Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time.
Success is not about luck, it’s about hard work and perseverance.
The only limits are those you place on yourself.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Every repetition is a vote for who you want to be.
Those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you.
Consistency isn't glamorous. It's powerful.
If you want something you’ve never had, you must be willing to do something you’ve never done.
To realize one's own potential is the greatest achievement.
Success is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
The chances you take, the people you meet, the people you love, the faith that you have.
Make your life a masterpiece; imagine no limitations on what you can be, have or do.
It’s not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
The journey is just as important as the destination.
Sometimes, the hardest battles are given to the strongest warriors.
Belief is the soil. Action is the water.
To infinity and beyond!
Don’t wait for perfect timing. Just begin.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
The greatest oak was once a little nut that held its ground.
Every sunrise is an invitation to rise and shine.
Keep showing up for yourself even when no one notices.
If it excites and scares you, it’s probably worth it.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
The heart is the true source of strength.
You are enough—even while becoming more.
We are stronger than we think.
You become what you think about most of the time.
The path may not be easy, but the destination makes it worth it.
The obstacle is the way.
Success doesn’t always shout—it often whispers through perseverance.
Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
Be like water making its way through cracks. Do not be assertive, but adjust to the object, and you shall find a way around or through it.
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
You didn’t come this far to only come this far.
Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.
I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Hope never dies, as long as you keep fighting.
Make your effort louder than your excuses.
The world is not beautiful. Therefore, it is.
Be so good they can’t ignore you.
Don’t let fear talk you out of your future.
Mindfulness isn’t difficult. We just need to remember to do it.
Don’t confuse resting with quitting.
You are allowed to outgrow people, places, and versions of yourself.
Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears.
I say luck is when an opportunity comes along and you’re prepared for it.
You either die a hero, or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
Turn pressure into purpose.
The superior man is modest in his speech but exceeds in his actions.
You are not alone. We are connected by our hearts.
Education breeds confidence. Confidence breeds hope. Hope breeds peace.
No matter how dark it gets, there's always light if you look for it.
Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
Even the strongest trees bend in storms. Bending doesn’t mean breaking.
Your life is your story. Write well, edit often.
Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more.
Learn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrow.
A lesson without effort is like a bird without wings.
We each have our own path to walk.
You should enjoy the little detours. Because that’s where you’ll find the things more important than what you want.
Let action be your loudest statement.
Invest three percent of your income in yourself (self-development) in order to guarantee your future.
Success isn’t owned. It’s leased, and rent is due every day.
It’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
Failure is a stepping stone to success.
Champions keep playing until they get it right.
Even if it’s a path of thorns, I’ll walk it without hesitation.
If you can’t fly then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
Little things make big days.
To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can’t go back to the happiness you could have.
The power to change the world lies within you.
The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
Not everything needs fixing—some things just need releasing.
Wherever there is charity and wisdom, there is neither fear nor ignorance.
Some wins are silent, but they count just the same.
Growth isn’t always loud. Sometimes it's just quiet healing.
Stand firm in who you're becoming.
Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
The moment you stop chasing approval is the moment you find freedom.
The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself.
Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow’s reality.
Sometimes the hardest battles lead to the greatest victories.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
We cannot direct the wind, but we can adjust the sails.
Growth looks good on you.
Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
The more you take away, the more you become.
Your light intimidates those still hiding in the dark.
Dreams only die when you give up on them.
Patience is the companion of wisdom.
You don’t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
Success is staying true to your path even when others walk away.
Inhale the future, exhale the past.
Put God first in everything you do.
Let your actions outshine your doubts.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
One day, all your hard work will pay off in ways you never imagined.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
To know the road ahead, ask those coming back.
You can't control the wind, but you can adjust your sails.
Believe in yourself, even when no one else does.
If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you’ll never get it done.
You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
Fall forward. Every failed experiment is one step closer to success.
A gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a man perfected without trials.
The ability to concentrate your attention on important things is a defining characteristic of intelligence.
The right path often looks lonely in the beginning.
Pain is the teacher of growth.
You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
Success is a state of mind. If you want success, start thinking of yourself as a success.
Be like the moon: inspire others even when you're far from full.
Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see further.
The discomfort you feel today is growth knocking.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
The heart knows what the mind cannot understand.
Don’t be afraid to fail. Be afraid not to try.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
Don’t shrink yourself to fit into places you’ve outgrown.
Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing.
The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
Success isn’t about how much money you make, it’s about the difference you make in people’s lives.
Create a life you don't need a vacation from.
The more you sweat in practice, the less you bleed in battle.
You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
Great things are done when men and mountains meet.
The world isn’t fair. But that doesn’t mean you can’t make it better.
The world isn’t just cruel, it’s also beautiful.
The future depends on what you do today.
Show up. Mess up. Level up.
When you choose peace, you’ve already won.
I am fundamentally an optimist. Whether that comes from nature or nurture, I cannot say.
To protect is to love.
When you master your mind, you master your world.
Sometimes, the best way forward is to pause and breathe.
You must let go of the illusion of control.
Being strong means knowing when to ask for help.
Humans aren’t made to live alone. We’re supposed to come together.
You are not weak because you cry. You are strong because you still stand.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
A river cuts through rock not because of its power but its persistence.
Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
When one door of happiness closes, another opens.
Pain is temporary, but pride is forever.
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Sometimes the strongest thing you can do is ask for help.
Even if you’re weak, there’s always a chance to grow stronger.
Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
You’re not meant to be perfect—just persistent.
Move out of your comfort zone. You can only grow if you are willing to feel awkward and uncomfortable when you try something new.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
Success depends upon previous preparation, and without such preparation, there is sure to be failure.
The fire within you must burn brighter than the chaos around you.
Energy flows where your focus goes.
In order to escape a crisis, sometimes you have to take a leap of faith.
Count your age by friends, not years. Count your life by smiles, not tears.
He who speaks without modesty will find it difficult to make his words good.
You have the power to rewrite your destiny.
It is not the strong who win, but the winners who are strong.
Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
It’s not about how bad you want it. It’s about how hard you’re willing to work for it.
The story isn’t over until you stop writing it.
The more credit you give away, the more will come back to you.
Even if you fall, get back up and keep moving forward.
Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally. It comes from what you do consistently.

People’s feelings are memories that transcend time.
Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
Real knowledge is to know the extent of one’s ignorance.
Never underestimate the strength built in solitude.
You can't change the past, but you can learn from it and shape the future.
The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
Never be afraid to fail.
Even the smallest light can shine through the darkest night.
To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can’t go back to the way you were before.
Even if I can’t do it now, I’ll get stronger and make it happen.
The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
The hardest battles make the strongest warriors.
In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
Every step forward is a victory.
A sword wields no strength unless the hand that holds it has courage.
a: Hero's Shade (The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess anime scenes)

q: Even when you're doubting, you're doing more than you think.
Build yourself so solid that no storm can move you.
Your comfort zone is a beautiful place, but nothing ever grows there.
It’s not the size of the dog in the fight, but the size of the fight in the dog.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
The world changes when you change yourself.

You won’t always feel ready. Do it anyway.
The future belongs to the ones who move now.
Don’t chase perfect—chase better.
When you’re at your lowest, that’s when you must rise the highest.
There is nothing more powerful than a girl with a book.
Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
Start before you're ready. Ready comes later.

A year from now you may wish you had started today.
Progress isn’t always pretty—but it’s still progress.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Sometimes, to protect someone, you have to hurt them.

You’re not chasing the dream—you’re becoming it.
You don’t have to be perfect to be powerful.
You can’t change the past, but you can learn from it.
Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.

The comeback is always stronger than the setback.

Never forget who you want to become.
Consistency is more powerful than motivation.

If you’re tired, learn to rest, not retreat.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.

Don’t be afraid to make sacrifices to protect those you love.
Growth comes from pain and perseverance.

You can do hard things.

Sometimes the smallest step in the right direction ends up being the biggest step of your life.

No one is coming to push you. Be your own force.
You don’t grow when you’re comfortable.
Storms make trees take deeper roots.
When you give up, that’s when the game is over.
Determination breaks through all barriers.

Sometimes what you need most is a little perspective.
Greatness is born from the willingness to keep trying.
Life begins at the edge of your comfort zone.
Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
Challenges are gifts that force us to search for a new center of gravity.
Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
a: Frodo Baggins (The Lord of the Rings anime references)

q: Patience attracts happiness; it brings near that which is far.
Choose progress over perfection.
Give the world a reason to remember your name.
Success is the progressive realization of a worthy goal or ideal.
Effort compounds even when progress feels invisible.
If nothing changes, nothing changes.
One often meets his destiny on the path he takes to avoid it.
Sometimes, the risk isn’t jumping. It’s staying still.
Sometimes, resilience is just getting up one more time.
It is better to light one small candle than to curse the darkness.
Just because it’s taking time doesn’t mean it’s not working.
Don't let the noise of the world silence your inner voice.
Your limits are only in your mind.

Believe in yourself and all that you are.
You create your own destiny with every choice.
Be happy, but never satisfied.
Success doesn’t come to you, you go to it.

Be the energy you want to attract.

a: Chris Gardner (The Pursuit of Happyness anime inspired)

q: Honor your effort even when results are invisible.
Your quiet perseverance is louder than a thousand failures.
Make today your testimony.
You are not your mistakes—you are your next move.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
Never stop dreaming, no matter how old you get.
We need to fight for freedom with every ounce of strength we have.
Let the lessons be heavier than the losses.
Work hard, stay positive, and get up early. It’s the best part of the day.
It’s not the load that breaks you, but how you carry it.
Courage doesn’t always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, ‘I will try again tomorrow.’
You're allowed to start over. This time with experience.
Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
You’re not late. You’re right on time for your life.
There’s no shortcut to any place worth going.
a: Beverly Sills (Portrayed in The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel)

q: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

You already overcame things you thought would break you.
You should never feel ashamed of doing what’s right.
Action beats overthinking every time.

Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others.
When the pain of staying the same outweighs the pain of change, you’ll change.

a: Bilbo Baggins (The Lord of the Rings)

q: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

There are no accidents.

There is always something more to learn.

A dream is worth fighting for, no matter how impossible it seems.
No storm lasts forever. Stay rooted.

You’ve done hard things before. You can do this too.

Happiness depends upon ourselves.

Quiet progress still changes the world.
Madness, as you know, is like gravity. All it takes is a little push.
Do it broken. Do it afraid. Just do it.
True strength is protecting those who cannot protect themselves.
I found that nothing in life is worthwhile unless you take risks.
To make something special, you just have to believe it’s special.
The climb may be tough, but the view from the top is worth every step.
Inhale confidence, exhale doubt.
Every great change begins with a brave decision.
Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
The extremists are afraid of books and pens, the power of education frightens them.
Your limitation—it’s only your imagination.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Your power means nothing if you don’t control it.
Power is not determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams.
Your future is shaped by the things you do when no one’s watching.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
A goal properly set is halfway reached.
Do or do not. There is no try.
Not all storms come to disrupt your life; some come to clear your path.
Let the quiet moments shape your loudest victories.
You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you.
The only approval you need is your own.
Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
You become what you believe.
True courage is standing alone for what is right.
When we see men of a contrary character, we should turn inwards and examine ourselves.
People’s lives don’t end when they die, it ends when they lose faith.
Make your life a mission, not an intermission.
The cautious seldom err.
True strength is not just about power, but how you protect those you care about.
Every storm ends—keep rowing.
Show up with grit when motivation goes quiet.
Don't be afraid to be different. Be afraid to be the same as everyone else.
The only time you fail is when you fall down and stay down.
True friends are the family you choose.
The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
One can never reach the summit if he does not begin his climb.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
We generate fears while we sit. We overcome them by action.
I won't run away anymore… I won't go back on my word… that is my ninja way!
Let your purpose be louder than your fear.
You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
Believe in yourself and the world will follow.
Hard choices build easy lives. Easy choices build hard lives.
Don’t be afraid. Be focused. Be determined. Be hopeful. Be empowered.
Success is a journey, not a destination.
You’re the hero in your story. Act like it.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
Every minute you spend in planning saves 10 minutes in execution; this gives you a 1,000 percent return on energy!
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Failure is the greatest teacher; embrace it.
The night is darkest just before the dawn.
If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
Sometimes we have to look beyond what we want and do what’s best.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
In the midst of winter, I found there was within me an invincible summer.
Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
Patience is not the ability to wait, but the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting.
The moment you’re ready to quit is usually the moment right before the miracle happens.
Don't wait for confidence—act, and it will follow.
Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail.
In this world, wherever there is light — there are also shadows.
Create the highest, grandest vision possible for your life, because you become what you believe.
Empty your mind, be formless, shapeless, like water.
Discipline yourself to do what you know you need to do to do to become the person you want to be.
You are too concerned with what was and what will be.
Those who fly alone have the strongest wings.
Everything counts. Even the smallest effort adds up.
The habits you build today are the foundation of tomorrow.
Sometimes, losing balance for love is part of living a balanced life.
Opportunities don’t happen, you create them.
You didn’t wake up today to be average.
Stand tall even when the world tries to push you down.
You get what you work for, not what you wish for.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
Let your vision scare and guide you.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
The ones who keep going, even when no one claps, are the ones who win.
Sometimes you must hurt in order to grow; you must fail in order to know; loss is gain; and the greatest lesson is learning to let go.
Without feelings of respect, what is there to distinguish men from beasts?
Either you run the day or the day runs you.
